          <title>
            <string language="en">Hygiene and beauty</string>
            <string language="fi">Puhtaus ja kauneus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hygiene und Schönheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hygiène et beauté</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Higiene e beleza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'igiene e bellezza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υγιεινή και ομορφιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Higiene y belleza</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Line drawing of hygiene and beauty products in a shop.</string>
            <string language="fi">Viivapiirros puhtauteen ja kauneuteen liittyvistä tuotteista kaupassa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnen Sie Zeichnung der Hygiene- und 
Schönheitsprodukte in einem System.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayez le schéma des produits d'hygiène et de 
beauté dans un système.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alinhe o desenho de produtos da higiene e da 
beleza em uma loja.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Allinei l'illustrazione dei prodotti di bellezza 
e dell'igiene in un negozio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο γραμμών των προϊόντων υγιεινής και ομορφιάς 
σε ένα κατάστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alinee el gráfico de los productos de la higiene
y de la belleza en un departamento.</string>
          </description>
